title: MSX Sony ‘Hit Bit’ HB-75B game console and accessories
material_description: Video games console with game controllers. Does not include computer monitor. Comes in box with manuals and several magazine advertisements for the unit. Object display only and not functioning
brief_description: MSX Sony ‘Hit Bit’ HB-75B video games console. Black computer unit includes keyboard with overlay and adhesive label sheet. Also included are MSX-Basic Reference Chart, Operating Instructions, Programming Reference Manual, Introduction to MSX-Basic, ‘Match Maker’ advertising flyers, aerial/TV/Computer cable and original packaging box.
